name: ShipExternalOrder
description: Ships an order that has been exported to an external system by another proces

properties.name: BackendID
properties.description: Reference to the order that is being shipped - required when `ID` is omitted

properties.name: BackendSystemID
properties.description: Reference to the system from which the order originated - required when `ID` is omitted

properties.name: FinalShipment
properties.description: Indicates if this is the last shipment - when set to true will cancel any remaining lines that are not shipped

properties.name: ID
properties.description: ID of the order that is being shipped - required when `BackendID` and `BackendSystemID` are omitted

properties.name: BackendID
properties.description: Reference number of the shipment

properties.name: BackendSystemID
properties.description: Identifier of the system that created the shipment

properties.name: CustomFields
properties.description: Optional additional custom fields

properties.name: ArrayValues
properties.description: Used for multiple values

properties.name: ArrayValues
properties.description: Used for multiple values

properties.name: BlobValue
properties.description: Used for datatype Blob

properties.name: BoolValue
properties.description: Used for datatype Bool

properties.name: DateTimeValue
properties.description: Used for datatype DateTime and Date

properties.name: NumberValue
properties.description: Used for datatype Integer and Decimal

properties.name: StringValue
properties.description: Used for datatype String, Text and Enum

properties.name: BlobValue
properties.description: Used for datatype Blob

properties.name: BoolValue
properties.description: Used for datatype Bool

properties.name: CustomFieldID
properties.description: Identifier for the custom field

properties.name: DateTimeValue
properties.description: Used for datatype DateTime and Date

properties.name: NumberValue
properties.description: Used for datatype Integer and Decimal

properties.name: StringValue
properties.description: Used for datatype String, Text and Enum

properties.name: BackendID
properties.description: Used to identify the order line - required if ID and Barcode are omitted

properties.name: Barcode
properties.description: Used to identify the order line - required if ID and BackendID are omitted

properties.name: ID
properties.description: Used to identify the order line - required if BackendID and Barcode are omitted

properties.name: Quantity
properties.description: Number of products that have been shipped

properties.name: SerialNumber
properties.description: In case of serial number products (like gift cards), this field is required and indicates the shipped serial number

properties.name: BackendID
properties.description: Used to identify the order line - required if ID and Barcode are omitted

properties.name: Barcode
properties.description: Used to identify the order line - required if ID and BackendID are omitted

properties.name: ID
properties.description: Used to identify the order line - required if BackendID and Barcode are omitted

properties.name: Quantity
properties.description: Number of products that have been shipped

properties.name: SerialNumber
properties.description: In case of serial number products (like gift cards), this field is required and indicates the shipped serial number

properties.name: ShipFromOrganizationUnitID
properties.description: Create shipment as being shipped from this OU, which affects which stock is mutated and the financial consequences of that

properties.name: TrackingCode
properties.description: Optional tracking code that is stored on the shipment.

properties.name: TrackingLink
properties.description: Optional tracking link that is stored on the shipment

properties.name: Code
properties.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

properties.name: Message
properties.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

properties.name: RequestID
properties.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: A short description of the error type.

properties.name: ExternalIDs
properties.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

properties.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
properties.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

properties.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
properties.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.
